All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Bonus
The abstract class representing a bonus object in the game.
Difficulties
Difficulties is a JPanel that contains buttons to select the difficulty of the game.
Door
Door class Opens when all keys are collected
DOrc
class for the DOrc extends enemy
Enemy
The abstract class representing an enemy in the game.
EnemyManager
The EnemyManager class manages the enemies in the game.
GameEndPanel
MenuPanel is a JPanel that contains a button to start the game.
GamePanel
The GamePanel class represents the main panel of the game where the game is played.
GridManager
The GridManager class manages the grid system for the game.
HelpPanel
HelpPanel is a JPanel that contains the instructions on how to play the game.
Key
Key object
KeyHandler
KeyHandler is a KeyListener that keeps track of the arrow keys.
KnightOrc
The KnightOrc class represents a type of enemy called KnightOrc in the game.
Main
Main class to start the game
MenuPanel
MenuPanel is a JPanel that contains a button to start the game.
Monster
A monster shaped trap It extends the Trap class and overrides certain methods to provide specific behavior for monsters.
Moving
The abstract class representing a moving object in the game.
Moving.DIRECTION
Enum representing the possible directions for movement.
Object
an Interactive Object
ObjectManager
The ObjectManager class manages the objects and bonuses in the game.
PanelManager
PanelManager class Manages the all panels Uses a CardLayout to switch between the panels
Player
The Player class represents the player in the game.
Sound
The Sound class represents a sound player in the game.
Speed
Represents a Speed bonus object in the game.
Spikes
The Spikes class represents a type of trap called "Spikes" in the game.
Tile
tile class description
Trap
The abstract class representing a trap object in the game.
UI
The UI class is responsible for drawing the user interface of the game.
Utility
Utility class for general purpose methods
Utility.DIFFICULTY
Enum for the difficulty of the game
